name: e-learning-platform
description: E-Learning platform with Django backend and Next.js frontend

scripts.start: concurrently "python manage.py migrate --settings=learning_platform.settings && python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8000 --settings=learning_platform.settings" "cd learningplatform_nowy\ 2/frontend && npm start"
scripts.build: python manage.py collectstatic --noinput --settings=learning_platform.settings && cd learningplatform_nowy\ 2/frontend && npm run build

author: Your Name
